HiddenText.Name: Can online degree students get I-Cards? If so, how?
HiddenText.OpenningText: Can Online Degree students get I-Cards? If so, how?
HiddenText.BodyCopy:
Online degree students are eligible for I-Cards, and requests are processed through the Bursar's office. To learn more about I-Cards and fill out the application visit:
http://www.byui.edu/financial-services/my-account/i-card/online-student-i-card-application-form
Students can also contact the Bursar's office at 208-496-1900 or idcenter@byui.edu if they have additional questions about I-Cards.
